sentences.sContent: This is the hour of an ablution heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the hour of an ablution heart.
sentences.sCn: 这是一个洗礼心灵的时刻。

sentences.sContent: As the herald of the new civilization, Desdemona allures the conceited hero to take off armour and attend the ablution of the new civilization.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the herald of the new civilization, Desdemona allures the conceited hero to take off armour and attend the ablution of the new civilization.
sentences.sCn: 苔斯狄蒙娜装扮成新文明的使者，诱使自以为是的英雄卸下恺甲，参加了新文明的洗礼。

sentences.sContent: When everybody reads this article, believed to had been passed in January the ablution of first try, begin to enter the preparative phase of the second-round exam.
sentences.sContent_eng: When everybody reads this article, believed to had been passed in January the ablution of first try, begin to enter the preparative phase of the second-round exam.
sentences.sCn: 当大家读到这篇文章的时候，相信已经经过了一月初试的洗礼，开始进入到复试的准备阶段了。

synos.tran: 洗礼；洗澡（常用复数）；斋戒沐浴

remMethod.val: ab + lut (冲， 洗) + ion (动作) → 清洗

trans.tranOther: the ritual washing of a priest's hands or of sacred vessels
